title: Position a Block
description: Build on the starter program that displays a short introduction of who you are. Your introduction should speak your name and one fact about you.
hint: Work with the existing program by adding one block and editing the blocks in your program. To do this, move the block from the tray to the block editor. Next, position the block between the two output blocks already in the editor. Then change the text so that your name and one important fact about you is spoken after you press run (CTRL + SHIFT + R).
